explains: n. 吸入，吸入法；吸入剂，吸入物

sentences.en: Death was due to asphyxia through smoke inhalation.
sentences.cn: 死亡是由烟尘吸入导致窒息引起的。

sentences.en: Hundreds of children were treated for smoke inhalation.
sentences.cn: 数以百计的儿童因吸入浓烟而接受了治疗。

sentences.en: They were taken to the hospital suffering from smoke inhalation.
sentences.cn: 他们因吸入浓烟被送进医院。
